Diana Ejaita bụ onye Naijiria-Italian na-ese ihe na onye mmebe textile
A mụrụ Ejaita na Italy. Ọ gụrụ ezigbo nka na France na Germany. Ka ọ na-erule 2020, ọ nọ na Berlin, Germany, na Lagos, Nigeria.
N'afọ 2014, Ejaita malitere akara ejiji, nke a na-akpọ WearYourMask, nke sitere na ọdịnala West Africa na ihe nketa Italo-Nigerian ya.
N'afọ 2019, e gosipụtara ọrụ Ejaita na ihe ngosi otu.Kunstgewerbemuseum (Museum of Decorative Arts) nke Berlin, nke a na-akpọ Afro Futures

Fashion - Hair - Design. N'otu afọ ahụ, o gosipụtara Google Doodle na-echeta ụbọchị ọmụmụ 119 nke Funmilayo Ransome-Kuti, onye nkuzi Naijiria na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị. Ejaita emeela mkpuchi anọ maka magazin The New Yorker
